div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 60px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 116px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
<<certbird-ca>>
root ca
(do not provide client certs)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 60px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
add root-ca
cert to docker
image

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 34px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 86px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 52px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;
div.div:
get signed
ssl cert bundle
(including int-ca cert)

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 102px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 30px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 76px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div: scales for many certificate rotations via kubernetes

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 106px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: center;
div.div:
rotate ssl certificate often
every 30 mins at least

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 440px; white-space: nowrap; overflow-wrap: normal; text-align: left;
div.div:
e.g.:
FROM ...
COPY ./root-ca.cert /usr/local/share/ca-certificate
RUN apt install ca-certificates -y && update-ca-certificates
